definitions.definition: A very large continent that split into smaller ones in the Earth ’s geologic past.
A modern landmass composed of multiple continents, i.e. Afro-Eurasia or the Americas .

main_definition: ( geology ) A very large continent that split into smaller ones in the Earth ’s geologic past.
secondary_definitions: A modern landmass composed of multiple continents, i.e. Afro-Eurasia or the Americas .
